Thu Dec 28 03:13:43 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/bin/jq /opt/bin/jq
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/include/jq.h /opt/include/jq.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/include/jv.h /opt/include/jv.h
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/lib/libjq.so.1 /opt/lib/libjq.so.1
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/lib/libjq.so.1.0.4 /opt/lib/libjq.so.1.0.4
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/lib/libjq.so /opt/lib/libjq.so
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/lib/pkgconfig/libjq.pc /opt/lib/pkgconfig/libjq.pc
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/lib/libjq.la /opt/lib/libjq.la
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/lib/libjq.a /opt/lib/libjq.a
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/doc
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/doc/jq
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/man
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man1
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/share/doc/jq/NEWS.md /opt/share/doc/jq/NEWS.md
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/share/doc/jq/README.md /opt/share/doc/jq/README.md
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/share/doc/jq/COPYING /opt/share/doc/jq/COPYING
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/share/doc/jq/AUTHORS /opt/share/doc/jq/AUTHORS
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/jq-1.7.1/share/man/man1/jq.1 /opt/share/man/man1/jq.1
